JobTitle: Product Data Analyst- Xbox Product Services
JobFullDesc: Xbox is one of the world’s most valuable brands and enjoys millions of players and passionate fans. An important part of our plan is to grow our global player base and our multi-billion dollar a year Xbox console and accessories business.  At Xbox, we believe Gamer Happiness is at the core to our mission of empowering every person and organization on the planet to achieve more. As part of Xbox Product Services (XPS), Xbox Community (XBC) supports the growth and happiness of our broader gaming community, including ensuring the safety and security all our members. We provide thought leadership and execute on growing a truly inclusive community wherever people play games. To do so, the Experiences Optimization and Insights (eXOI) team within the Xbox Community (XBC) team is looking for passionate individuals that know how to leverage data, tell a story, and partner with teams across Xbox to deliver on world class social experiences.  You’ll play a key role in uncovering how Xbox gamers socially engage and help uncover new opportunities to drive social engagement within the Xbox network.  You’ll also play a key role working with the Xbox Community leadership team to understand how we are tracking to our goals, and identify new ways to measure how we are delivering on our mission. If you have a passion for gaming, technology, social media, and leveraging big data, this is the team for you.  Where else will you get to help gamers have more fun, find more friends to play with, and leverage your data skills?ResponsibilitiesShape, analyze, and tell a story leveraging data from varying sources to provide insights into how gamers are engaging in the Xbox ecosystem, and uncover new patterns to improve gamer experiences. Partner with Product Management, Design, and Engineering teams to discover and craft metrics to measure our success and use of our ecosystem ….
